{T}: Add {C}.

Equip {0}

2XM.flavor: There are few problems that can't be solved by putting a hole in the world.
2XM.name: Lux Cannon
2XM.text:
{T}: Put a charge counter on Lux Cannon.
{T}, Remove three charge counters from Lux Cannon: Destroy target permanent.

2XM.flavor: He climbs a staircase of falling souls, fighting the continuous pull of the void.
2XM.name: Magus of the Abyss
2XM.text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, destroy target nonartifact creature that player controls of their choice. It can't be regenerated.

2XM.flavor: "These eyes have shown me the flaws of flesh."
2XM.name: Magus of the Will
2XM.text: {2}{B}, {T}, Exile Magus of the Will: Until end of turn, you may play lands and cast spells from your graveyard. If a card would be put into your graveyard from anywhere this turn, exile that card instead.

2XM.name: Mana Crypt
2XM.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, flip a coin. If you lose the flip, Mana Crypt deals 3 damage to you.
{T}: Add {C}{C}.

2XM.flavor: At first they thought the vault was empty. Then the walls began to glow.
2XM.name: Mana Crypt
2XM.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, flip a coin. If you lose the flip, Mana Crypt deals 3 damage to you.
{T}: Add {C}{C}.

2XM.flavor: The greatest wonders of nature are found in the smallest saplings straining toward the canopy.
2XM.name: Mana Reflection
2XM.text: If you tap a permanent for mana, it produces twice as much of that mana instead.

2XM.flavor:
"Master the chaotic forces of nature, and you shall master magic."
—Yare-Tiva, warden of Gramur forest
2XM.name: Manamorphose
2XM.text:
Add two mana in any combination of colors.
Draw a card.

2XM.flavor: "Wasted potential surrounds us. Lend me that bauble, and let me see what it can be made to be."
2XM.name: Master Transmuter
2XM.text: {U}, {T}, Return an artifact you control to its owner's hand: You may put an artifact card from your hand onto the battlefield.

2XM.flavor: "Only a mind unfettered with the concerns of the flesh can see the world as it truly is."
2XM.name: Master of Etherium
2XM.text:
Master of Etherium's power and toughness are each equal to the number of artifacts you control.
Other artifact creatures you control get +1/+1.

2XM.flavor:
"The crucible yields what you have forged in your mind. You need only reach in and draw the masterwork forth."
—Wahara, Keeper of the Crucible
2XM.name: Masterwork of Ingenuity
2XM.text: You may have Masterwork of Ingenuity enter the battlefield as a copy of any Equipment on the battlefield.

2XM.name: Maze of Ith
2XM.text: {T}: Untap target attacking creature. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by that creature this turn.

2XM.flavor: The clicks and buzz of the undercity proclaim him the incarnation of decay.
2XM.name: Mazirek, Kraul Death Priest
2XM.text:
Flying
Whenever a player sacrifices another permanent, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.

2XM.flavor: "This violent wasteland is an indictment of its people. These cowards lack the will to oppose disorder."
2XM.name: Meddling Mage
2XM.text:
As Meddling Mage enters the battlefield, choose a nonland card name.
Spells with the chosen name can't be cast.

2XM.flavor: "Some defy the laws of nature. I dare nature to defy me."
2XM.name: Meddling Mage
2XM.text:
As Meddling Mage enters the battlefield, choose a nonland card name.
Spells with the chosen name can't be cast.

2XM.flavor:
"Arcum is a babbling fool! Phyrexian technology is our greatest blessing. Take this delightful trinket for instance . . ."
—Heidar, Rimewind master
2XM.name: Mishra's Bauble
2XM.text: {T}, Sacrifice Mishra's Bauble: Look at the top card of target player's library. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

2XM.flavor: The suns of Mirrodin have shone upon perfection only once.
2XM.name: Mox Opal
2XM.text: Metalcraft — {T}: Add one mana of any color. Activate this ability only if you control three or more artifacts.

2XM.flavor: What crossed her mind defied Orthodoxy: could there be perfection beyond *compleation*?
2XM.name: Mox Opal
2XM.text: Metalcraft — {T}: Add one mana of any color. Activate this ability only if you control three or more artifacts.

2XM.name: Myr Battlesphere
2XM.text:
When Myr Battlesphere enters the battlefield, create four 1/1 colorless Myr artifact creature tokens.
Whenever Myr Battlesphere attacks, you may tap X untapped Myr you control. If you do, Myr Battlesphere gets +X/+0 until end of turn and deals X damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.

2XM.flavor: The gate of every kithkin doun is a cunning trap, intended to spill visitors into an oubliette from which there is no escape.
2XM.name: Mystic Gate
2XM.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{W/U}, {T}: Add {W}{W}, {W}{U}, or {U}{U}.

2XM.flavor: She protects the sacred groves from blight, drought, and the Unbeholden.
2XM.name: Noble Hierarch
2XM.text:
Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
{T}: Add {G}, {W}, or {U}.

2XM.flavor: In all her years of vigil, her resolve has never faltered.
2XM.name: Noble Hierarch
2XM.text:
Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
{T}: Add {G}, {W}, or {U}.

2XM.text:
{4}, {T}: Put a fate counter on target permanent.
{5}, {T}, Sacrifice Oblivion Stone: Destroy each nonland permanent without a fate counter on it, then remove all fate counters from all permanents.

2XM.flavor: When the vaults are empty, everyone is rich.
2XM.name: Open the Vaults
2XM.text: Return all artifact and enchantment cards from all graveyards to the battlefield under their owners' control. (Auras with nothing to enchant remain in graveyards.)

2XM.name: Path to Exile
2XM.text: Exile target creature. Its controller may search their library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle their library.

2XM.name: Pentad Prism
2XM.text:
Sunburst (This enters the battlefield with a charge counter on it for each color of mana spent to cast it.)
Remove a charge counter from Pentad Prism: Add one mana of any color.

2XM.name: Phyrexian Metamorph
2XM.text:
({U/P} can be paid with either {U} or 2 life.)
You may have Phyrexian Metamorph enter the battlefield as a copy of any artifact or creature on the battlefield, except it's an artifact in addition to its other types.

2XM.text:
({U/P} can be paid with either {U} or 2 life.)
You may have Phyrexian Metamorph enter the battlefield as a copy of any artifact or creature on the battlefield, except it's an artifact in addition to its other types.

2XM.flavor:
"To be in the presence of a revoker is to be truly alone."
—Kara Vrist, Neurok agent
2XM.name: Phyrexian Revoker
2XM.text:
As Phyrexian Revoker enters the battlefield, choose a nonland card name.
Activated abilities of sources with the chosen name can't be activated.

2XM.flavor:
"Melt that which was never frozen."
—Spellbomb inscription

{1}, Sacrifice Pyrite Spellbomb: Draw a card.

2XM.name: Ravenous Trap
2XM.text:
If an opponent had three or more cards put into their graveyard from anywhere this turn, you may pay {0} rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Exile all cards from target player's graveyard.

2XM.flavor: "What was once formed by masons, shaped by smiths, or given life by mages, I will return to the embrace of the earth."
2XM.name: Reclamation Sage
2XM.text: When Reclamation Sage enters the battlefield, you may destroy target artifact or enchantment.

2XM.flavor:
"Today's paperweight, tomorrow's leveler."
—Bruenna, Neurok leader
2XM.name: Reshape
2XM.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice an artifact.
Search your library for an artifact card with converted mana cost X or less and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

2XM.flavor: Whole again in honor and horn.
2XM.name: Rhys the Redeemed
2XM.text:
{2}{G/W}, {T}: Create a 1/1 green and white Elf Warrior creature token.
{4}{G/W}{G/W}, {T}: For each creature token you control, create a token that's a copy of that creature.

2XM.flavor: An empire can take centuries to build but mere moments to destroy.
2XM.name: Rolling Earthquake
2XM.text: Rolling Earthquake deals X damage to each creature without horsemanship and each player.

2XM.name: Salvage Titan
2XM.text:

Double strike

{1}{R/G}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Savageborn Hydra. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

2XM.flavor: An artificer once dropped one in a vault full of coins. She has yet to find it.
2XM.name: Sculpting Steel
2XM.text: You may have Sculpting Steel enter the battlefield as a copy of any artifact on the battlefield.

2XM.flavor: They are the masters of your mind.
2XM.name: Sen Triplets
2XM.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, choose target opponent. This turn, that player can't cast spells or activate abilities and plays with their hand revealed. You may play lands and cast spells from that player's hand this turn.

2XM.flavor: First, whispers of ancient days. Then, visions of things to come.
2XM.name: Shamanic Revelation
2XM.text:
Draw a card for each creature you control.
Ferocious — You gain 4 life for each creature you control with power 4 or greater.

2XM.flavor: To gain audience with the hegemon, one must bring a riddle she has not heard.
2XM.name: Sharuum the Hegemon
2XM.text:
Flying
When Sharuum the Hegemon enters the battlefield, you may return target artifact card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

2XM.flavor: "Thraben's pleas fall on deaf ears. Ours do not."
2XM.name: Skirsdag High Priest

Flying

{B}: Skithiryx, the Blight Dragon gains haste until end of turn.

2XM.name: Sneak Attack

2XM.flavor: "Keep watch? Why? Nothing going to mess with us. We too big and scary."
2XM.name: Sneak Attack
2XM.text: {R}: You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield. That creature gains haste. Sacrifice the creature at the beginning of the next end step.

2XM.flavor:
"Let's show Vorinclex that progress doesn't always need teeth or claws."
—Malcator, Executor of Synthesis

Vigilance
{1}{W}, {T}: Search your library for an Equipment card and put it onto the battlefield. Attach it to a creature you control. Then shuffle your library.

2XM.flavor:
"Even if we defeat it, what remains to be saved?"
—Glissa Sunseeker

{T}: Add {C}.
{U/B}, {T}: Add {U}{U}, {U}{B}, or {B}{B}.

2XM.flavor: Amid rumors of war, the third act of *The Absolution of the Guildpact* was quickly rewritten as a tragedy.
2XM.name: Thespian's Stage

{T}: Add {C}.
{2}, {T}: Thespian's Stage becomes a copy of target land, except it has this ability.

2XM.flavor: Lymph, the fluid essence of blinkmoths, is prized by wizards for the rush of intellect it provides.
2XM.name: Thirst for Knowledge
2XM.text: Draw three cards. Then discard two cards unless you discard an artifact card.

2XM.flavor: Only when two oracles speak in unison is an omen accepted as truth.
2XM.name: Thought Reflection
2XM.text: If you would draw a card, draw two cards instead.

2XM.flavor: "If you've been at this as long as I have, nothing can surprise you. That's the hope, at least."
2XM.name: Thraben Inspector
2XM.text: When Thraben Inspector enters the battlefield, investigate. (Create a colorless Clue artifact token with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

2XM.flavor:
"Always carry two spears."
—Mokgar, Kalonian hunter
2XM.name: Thragtusk
2XM.text:
When Thragtusk enters the battlefield, you gain 5 life.
When Thragtusk leaves the battlefield, create a 3/3 green Beast creature token.

2XM.flavor: At the heart of Ish Sah, Geth stokes the dark fires of Phyrexia.
2XM.name: Throne of Geth

2XM.flavor:
"I pray that I am never considered useless or old."
—Sharuum the Hegemon

2XM.flavor: Goblins generally have two possessions: one per hand.

As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice an artifact.
Return target artifact card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

2XM.name: Treasure Keeper
2XM.text: When Treasure Keeper dies, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a nonland card with converted mana cost 3 or less. You may cast that card without paying its mana cost. Put all revealed cards not cast this way on the bottom of your library in a random order.

2XM.name: Treasure Mage
2XM.text: When Treasure Mage enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an artifact card with converted mana cost 6 or greater, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

2XM.name: Trinisphere
2XM.text: As long as Trinisphere is untapped, each spell that would cost less than three mana to cast costs three mana to cast. (Additional mana in the cost may be paid with any color of mana or colorless mana. For example, a spell that would cost {1}{B} to cast costs {2}{B} to cast instead.)

2XM.flavor: Remade by Eldrazi magic, Tuktuk inspired an entire clan of misguided goblins.

Haste
